sections.heading: Effect of indefinite or incomplete nameA recorded instrument is effective with respect to a third person if the name of a party is not so indefinite, incomplete, or erroneous as to be misleading and the instrument as a whole reasonably alerts a person examining the records that the instrument may be
sections.text: Effect of indefinite or incomplete nameA recorded instrument is effective with respect to a third person if the name of a party is not so indefinite, incomplete, or erroneous as to be misleading and the instrument as a whole reasonably alerts a person examining the records that the instrument may be that of the party.Acts 2005, No. 169, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2006; Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, eff. Nov. 29, 2005.NOTE: Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, changed the effective date of Acts 2005, No. 169, to July 1, 2006.
